JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Great part-time cleaning job at Feriepartner Tversted/Skagen    -    Godt fritidsjob ved Feriepartner Tversted/Skagen
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
- for 2-3 veninder/venner, et par eller?- til rengøring af vores flotte sommerhuse.

Vil I bruge lidt weekender på at tjene ekstra penge til f.eks. en rejse, en bil, eller hvad I nu har lyst til? Så er det os, I skal tage fat i.

Vi udlejer de flotteste sommerhuse langs de danske kyster og for at sikre, at vores gæster er fuldt ud tilfredse og kommer igen, så skal kvaliteten af rengøringen være helt i top.

Derfor søger vi nu de absolut bedste rengøringsfolk i Danmark! Vi skal nok lære jer op. Blot I er flittige, grundige og pligtopfyldende (og bare rolig vi kører ikke med akkord) og har en bil til at komme fra hus til hus, så vil vi rigtig gerne høre fra jer.

Ud over en god løn, har i mulighed for stærke personalefordele. Send en ansøgning, ring eller kig forbi kontoret for at høre nærmere om det, for vi ansætter løbende.

Vi ansætter løbende og glæder os til at modtage jeres ansøgning.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Come and work for us cleaning our amazing holiday homes in Denmark - either you alone, 2-3 girlfriends/friends, a couple or?

Do you want to spend weekends earning extra money for whatever you need or want? Then you must talk to us.

Feriepartner is Denmark’s largest chain of independent rental agencies. We rent the best holiday homes in some of Denmark’s most beautiful holiday areas.

To ensure that our guests are fully satisfied and want to come visit us again, the quality of the cleaning must be top notch.

That is why, we now are looking for the best cleaning workers there is. We will train and teach you; you only need to be diligent, thorough, and dutiful.

If you have a car that is great, but it is not a must. If you work more people together, we will arrange for a pick up.

We are proud of our work environment and the salary is good. Just send us an application, call us, or come by the office – we will fill you in with all the details.

We hire on an ongoing basis, and we look forward to meeting you.

 

For the sake of protection of personal data, please ensure that the documents you submit in connection with your application does not contain sensitive personal data, such as CPR number, health information, ethnic background, political and religious beliefs, sexual relations etc.
